thread.section_title: eUKhost Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eUKhost Ltd | www.eukhost.com | 3 of 18
thread.title: Ifthi Idris
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Ifthi Idris

author: Ifthi Idris
title: Ifthi Idris
text:
Eukhost always gave me awesome support, This morning I had to set up a website and create temp URL. Rony L from Technical Support team not only setup the URL he took his valuable time and guided how I could do by showing step by step process.
I highly recommend Eukhost, their performance is awesome, I am using dedicated servers. When it comes to online chat, they are friendly, I know whenever I contact them I get the problem solve.
Ifthi Idris
Smart Business Consultancy
Wellington - New Zealand
